subject: Dear Sir
body:
Dear Sir
We have completed your online account below is your online account details
https:/ /www.pelicanstatecu.com
User: 
admin@bankserv.com
Password : 123123
To fully access your funds you are expected to pay $3,756.55
We look forward to hear from you ASAP.
Yours Sincerely
Mrs. Annette Thames
Executive management /Pelican state Credit Union

subject: Re:   Dear Sir
body:
Dear Mrs. Annette Thames,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance in providing the details of my online account. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Could you please clarify what exactly needs to be paid in order to fully access my funds?
2. What are the payment options available? Are there any specific instructions I need to follow?
3. Is there a deadline by which the payment needs to be made?

I apologize for any inconvenience caused, but I want to ensure that I have all the necessary information before proceeding.

Thank you once again for your help.

Best wishes,
Joyce

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Dear Joyce

We acknowledge the receipt of your email and content noted .

1, The only charge needed to be pay in order to access your funds is an 
activation charge of USD$3,600.00

2. There are no specified instructions to follow,will only need to login 
the details that will be mail to you after confirmation of the fee as 
mentioned above.

3. Yes, there are deadlines...But you are mandated to give us a specify 
date when payment will be made.

Look forward to hear from you ASAP

Yours Sincerely
Mrs. Annette Thames
Executive management /Pelican state Credit Union.

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Dear Mrs. Annette Thames,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with the information. I understand that there is an activation charge required to access my funds. Could you please provide me with more details about this fee? How much is the activation charge in USD?

Also, I would like to know how I can make the payment for the activation charge. Do you accept credit card payments or is there a specific method of payment that I need to use?

I appreciate your assistance and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Joyce

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Dear Mrs. Annette Thames,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with the information. I understand that there is an activation charge required to access my funds. Could you please provide me with more details about this fee? How much is the activation charge in USD?

Also, I would like to know how I can make the payment for this activation charge. Do you accept credit card payments or is there a specific method that I need to use?

Lastly, could you please clarify what you mean by "login details"? Are these login details for accessing my funds online? If so, how do I go about setting up an online account?

I appreciate your assistance and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Joyce

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Dear Joyce

Once Again ..The activation charge is USD$3,600.00 (Three Thousand Six 
hundred United State Dollars)

Yes , we accept credit card payment to our Bitcoin wallet: 
bc1qjn04gut0akc9h7xgjs4p0vcq39paj8a3s4lz5j ,also you can use your credit 
card  to buy a Steam Gift Card from a gift card shop or Walmart shop 
,snap and forward it or picture and forward it via email . use your 
credit card to pay for Bitcoin or buy Steam Card or gift card .

Lastly ,Login details are use to login to your online account , as all 
details needed will be mail to you after your payment is received  and 
also the Login details will allow you to access your funds online and 
know how much is credited to you ..

We are to setup your online account  and give all details to login in 
and access your funds .

Payment USD$3,600.00 (Three Thousand Six hundred United State Dollars)  
must be send today to enable you have access to your funds on Monday 
dated 12th.

Look forward to receive your payment confirmation details ASAP

Yours Sincerely
Mrs. Annette Thames
Executive management /Pelican state Credit Union.

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:
Dear Mrs. Annette Thames,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding the activation charge. However, I have a few questions before proceeding with the payment.

1. Can you please explain why there is an activation charge? What does it cover?

2. Is there any specific reason why I need to use a credit card to buy Steam Gift Cards? Can I use any other method of payment?

3. Could you provide more details about how the login process works? How secure is it?

4. Is there a specific reason why the payment needs to be sent today in order to access my funds on Monday? Can this deadline be extended?

I look forward to your response and further clarification.

Best wishes,
Joyce

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:

subject: Re: Dear Sir
body:

subject: OUR 24/7 BANKING SERVICES

subject: Re: OUR 24/7 BANKING SERVICES
body:

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the payment request. I appreciate your prompt response. However, before I proceed any further, I have a few questions.

Firstly, could you please clarify what exactly this payment is for? It would be helpful to have more information about the purpose and details of the transaction.

Secondly, why is it necessary for me to provide my ID or driver's license copy? Is there a specific reason or requirement for this? I just want to ensure that my personal information is handled securely.

Lastly, you mentioned discussing the payment in my favor once I provide my passport. Could you please explain how this will benefit me and what exactly will be discussed?

I look forward to your response and gaining a better understanding of this payment request.

Best wishes,
Joyce

subject: Re: OUR 24/7 BANKING SERVICES
body:
Dear Mrs. Annette Thames,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your email and the information you have provided. It's interesting to hear that the payment is an inherited sum in my name. Can you please provide more details about the source of this inheritance? I would like to understand how it came about.

You mentioned that my ID is highly secure with the bank. That's reassuring to know. Could you explain what measures are in place to ensure the security of my personal information?

I'm also curious about how I can use my online account to make cash transfers to my local account. Could you please elaborate on the process and any fees associated with it?

Best wishes,
Joyce
